pullRequest.title: CB-5465 RDS subnet selection should use limited number of subnets in an environment

beforeCommit.message: CB-5465 RDS subnet selection should use limited number of subnets in an environment

afterCommit.message: CB-5465 RDS subnet selection should use limited number of subnets in an environment

nodes.bodyText: I think this should be based on the AWS db deploy config. As I know currently we are using non multi AZ deployments in local mode so probably we dont need 2 subnet.
Can you please validate that we choose 2 subnet in different az ?
I think it shoulf be great to check the error message as well.
this should be depend on the deployment config
I think if the solution is generalized then this message is not good anymore: "Subnets are in %d different AZ, but subnets in %d different AZs required."
In a generalized solution this message is not valid any more. I would suggest "Insufficient number of subnets: at least %d subnets required"
I would rename it to testMultiplePrivateSubnetTwoDifferentAz
